attributes.title: Manifest Powers Using Mandalas At Inner Awakening
attributes.description:
In this video, taken from an Inner Awakening session on 14th March 2017, Paramahamsa Nithyananda reveals the Veda-Agamic science of using Mandalas to experience higher states of consciousness and manifest extraordinary Shaktis (powers).
 He elaborates on the Bhuvanai Brahmanda Yoni Mandala which holds the mother energy of the cosmos. This energy when awakened in the individual leads to manifestation of all powers.

You can experience the science of Mandalas and other spiritual alchemy products which lead to power manifestation at Inner Awakening! For more details, visit: http://innerawakening.org
